## 2.5 三重积分及富比尼定理

### 2.5.1 三重积分定义

设![f(x,y,z)](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%228.729ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%203758.3%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Ef(x%2Cy%2Cz)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-66%22%20d%3D%22M118%20-162Q120%20-162%20124%20-164T135%20-167T147%20-168Q160%20-168%20171%20-155T187%20-126Q197%20-99%20221%2027T267%20267T289%20382V385H242Q195%20385%20192%20387Q188%20390%20188%20397L195%20425Q197%20430%20203%20430T250%20431Q298%20431%20298%20432Q298%20434%20307%20482T319%20540Q356%20705%20465%20705Q502%20703%20526%20683T550%20630Q550%20594%20529%20578T487%20561Q443%20561%20443%20603Q443%20622%20454%20636T478%20657L487%20662Q471%20668%20457%20668Q445%20668%20434%20658T419%20630Q412%20601%20403%20552T387%20469T380%20433Q380%20431%20435%20431Q480%20431%20487%20430T498%20424Q499%20420%20496%20407T491%20391Q489%20386%20482%20386T428%20385H372L349%20263Q301%2015%20282%20-47Q255%20-132%20212%20-173Q175%20-205%20139%20-205Q107%20-205%2081%20-186T55%20-132Q55%20-95%2076%20-78T118%20-61Q162%20-61%20162%20-103Q162%20-122%20151%20-136T127%20-157L118%20-162Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-78%22%20d%3D%22M52%20289Q59%20331%20106%20386T222%20442Q257%20 ### 2.5.2 三次积分

假如有如下的类型![\text{I}](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%220.84ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20361.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Ctext%7BI%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-49%22%20d%3D%22M328%200Q307%203%20180%203T32%200H21V46H43Q92%2046%20106%2049T126%2060Q128%2063%20128%20342Q128%20620%20126%20623Q122%20628%20118%20630T96%20635T43%20637H21V683H32Q53%20680%20180%20680T328%20683H339V637H317Q268%20637%20254%20634T234%20623Q232%20620%20232%20342Q232%2063%20234%2060Q238%2055%20242%2053T264%2048T317%2046H339V0H328Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-49%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)区域![E](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.776ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20764.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EE%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-45%22%20d%3D%22M492%20213Q472%20213%20472%20226Q472%20230%20477%20250T482%20285Q482%20316%20461%20323T364%20330H312Q311%20328%20277%20192T243%2052Q243%2048%20254%2048T33 &=\int_{a}^{b}\int_{g_1(x)}^{g_2(x)}\int_{u_1(x,y)}^{u_2(x,y)}f(x,y,z)\mathrm{d}z\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}x \end{aligned} >
> 于是：
>
> ![ \begin{aligned}     \iiint_\limits{\Omega}z\mathrm{d}V         &=\int_{0}^{1}\int_{0}^{1-x}\int_0^{1-x-y}z\mathrm{d}z\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}x=\int_{0}^{1}\int_{0}^{1-x}\left[\frac{z^2}{2}\right]_{z=0}^{z=1-x-y}\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}x\\         \\         &=\frac{1}{2}\int_{0}^{1}\int_{0}^{1-x}(1-x-y)^2\mathrm{d}y\mathrm{d}x=\frac{1}{2}\int_{0}^{1}\left[-\frac{(1-x-y)^3}{3}\right]_{y=0}^{y=1-x}\mathrm{d}x\\         \\         &=\frac{1}{6}\int_{0}^{1}(1-x)^3\mathrm{d}x=\frac{1}{6}\left[-\frac{(1-x)^4}{4}\right]_0^1=\frac{1}{24} \end{aligned} ## 2.6 三重积分的换元

### 2.6.1 柱面坐标系

柱面坐标系和直角坐标系的坐标变换函数为：

### 2.6.2 柱面坐标系的体积微分

通过雅可比行列式![|J|](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.765ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%201190.5%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%7CJ%7C%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20d%3D%22M139%20-249H137Q125%20-249%20119%20-235V251L120%20737Q130%20750%20139%20750Q152%20750%20159%20735V-235Q151%20-249%20141%20-249H139Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4A%22%20d%3D%22M447%20625Q447%20637%20354%20637H329Q323%20642%20323%20645T325%20664Q329%20677%20335%20683H352Q393%20681%20498%20681Q541%20681%20568%20681T605%20682T619%20682Q633%20682%20633%20672Q633%20670%20630%20658Q626%20642%20623%20640T604%20637Q552%20637%20545%20623Q541%20610%20483%20376Q420%20128%20419%20127Q397%2064%20333%2021T195%20-22Q137%20-22%2097%208T57%2088Q57%20130%2080%20152T132%20174Q177%20174%20182%20130Q182%2098%20164%2080T123%2056Q115%2054%20115%2053T122%2044Q148%2015%20197%2015Q235%2015%20271%2047T324%20130Q328%20142%20387%20380T447%20625Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4A%22%20x%3D%22278%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20x%3D%22912%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)，可得柱面坐标系函数![w=f(\rho,\theta,z)](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2 6%20454Q666%20392%20635%20330T559%20200T499%2083V80H543Q589%2081%20600%2083T617%2093Q622%20102%20629%20135T636%20172L637%20177H677V175L660%2089Q645%203%20644%202V0H552H488Q461%200%20456%203T451%2020Q451%2089%20499%20235T548%20455Q548%20512%20530%20555T483%20622T424%20656T361%20668Q332%20668%20303%20658T243%20626T193%20560T174%20456Q174%20380%20222%20233T270%2020Q270%207%20263%200H77V2Q76%203%2061%2089L44%20175V177H84L85%20172Q85%20171%2088%20155T96%20119T104%2093Q109%2086%20120%2084T178%2080H222V83Q206%20132%20162%20199T87%20329T55%20454Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3A9%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)上的三重积分为：

该函数的雅可比矩阵为：

对应的雅可比行列式为：

### 2.6.3 球面坐标系

三维空间中的点，可以看成在不同半径的球面上。所以空间中的任意一点![P(x,y,z)](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%229.196ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%203959.3%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EP(x%2Cy%2Cz)%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-50%22%20d%3D%22M287%20628Q287%20635%20230%20637Q206%20637%20199%20638T192%20648Q192%20649%20194%20659Q200%20679%20203%20681T397%20683Q587%20682%20600%20680Q664%20669%20707%20631T751%20530Q751%20453%20685%20389Q616%20321%20507%20303Q500%20302%20402%20301H307L277%20182Q247%2066%20247%2059Q247%2055%20248%2054T255%2050T272%2048T305%2046H336Q342%2037%20342%2035Q342%2019%20335%205Q330%200%20319%200Q316%200%20282%201T182%202Q120%202%2087%202T51%201Q33%201%2033%2011Q33%2013%2036%2025Q40%2041%2044%2043T67%2046Q94%2046%20127%2049Q141%2052%20146%2061Q149%2065%20218%20339T287%20628ZM645%20554Q645%20567%20643%20575T634%20597T609%20619T560%20635Q553%20636%20480%20637Q463%20637%20445%20637T416%20636T404%20636Q391%20635%20386%20627Q384%20621%20367%20550T332%20412T314%20344Q314%20342%20395%20342H407H430Q542%20342%20590%20392Q617%20419%20631%20471T645%20554Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20d%3D%22M94%20250Q94%20319%20104%20381T127%20488T164%20576T202%20643T244%20695T277%20729T302%20750H315H319Q333%20750%20333%20741Q333%20738%20316%20720T275%20667T226%20581T184%20443T167%20250T184%2058T225%20-81T274%20-167T316%20-220T333%20-241Q333%20-250%20318%20-250H315H302L274%20-226Q180%20-141%20137%20-14T94%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-78%22%20d%3D%22M52%20289Q59%20331%20106%20386T222%20442 球面坐标系和直角坐标系的转换函数为：

### 2.6.4 球面坐标系的体积微分

通过雅可比行列式![|J|](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%222.765ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%201190.5%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%7CJ%7C%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20d%3D%22M139%20-249H137Q125%20-249%20119%20-235V251L120%20737Q130%20750%20139%20750Q152%20750%20159%20735V-235Q151%20-249%20141%20-249H139Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-4A%22%20d%3D%22M447%20625Q447%20637%20354%20637H329Q323%20642%20323%20645T325%20664Q329%20677%20335%20683H352Q393%20681%20498%20681Q541%20681%20568%20681T605%20682T619%20682Q633%20682%20633%20672Q633%20670%20630%20658Q626%20642%20623%20640T604%20637Q552%20637%20545%20623Q541%20610%20483%20376Q420%20128%20419%20127Q397%2064%20333%2021T195%20-22Q137%20-22%2097%208T57%2088Q57%20130%2080%20152T132%20174Q177%20174%20182%20130Q182%2098%20164%2080T123%2056Q115%2054%20115%2053T122%2044Q148%2015%20197%2015Q235%2015%20271%2047T324%20130Q328%20142%20387%20380T447%20625Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-4A%22%20x%3D%22278%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-7C%22%20x%3D%22912%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)，可得球面坐标系函数![w=f(r,\varphi,\theta)](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.or 20-250T58%20-247T55%20-238Q56%20-237%2066%20-225Q221%20-64%20221%20250T66%20725Q56%20737%2055%20738Q55%20746%2060%20749Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-77%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%22994%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-66%22%20x%3D%222050%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%222601%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20x%3D%222990%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2C%22%20x%3D%223442%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3C6%22%20x%3D%223887%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2C%22%20x%3D%224541%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3B8%22%20x%3D%224986%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%225456%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)在区域![\Omega](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.678ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20722.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5COmega%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-3A9%22%20d%3D%22M55%20454Q55%20503%2075%20546T127%20617T197%20665T272%20695T337%20704H352Q396%20704%20404%20703Q527%20687%20596%20615T666%20454Q666%20392%20635%20330T559%20200T499%2083V80H543Q589%2081%20600%2083T617%2093Q622%20102%20629%20135T636%20172L637%20177H677V175L660%2089Q645%203%20644%202V0H552H488Q461%200%20456%203T451%2020Q451%2089%20499%20235T548%20455Q548%20512%20530%20555T483%20622T424%20656T361%20668Q332%20668%20303%20658T243%20626T193%20560T174%20456Q174%20380%20222%20233T270%2020Q270%207%20263%200H77V2Q76%203%2061%2089L44%20175V177H84L85%20172Q85%20171%2088%20155T96%20119T104%2093Q109%2086%20120%2084T178%2080H222V83Q206%20132%20162%20199T87%20329T55%20454Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3A9%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)上的三重积分为：
